declarations.comments:
Represents the set of solutions for the function solveLinearSystem.
The set of solutions is { sol + v | v is a linear combination of vectors in basis }
declarations.title: Solutions

declarations.comments:
computes the identity matrix of size n
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Identity_matrix
declarations.title: identity

declarations.comments:
returns the element at indices (i, j)
returns zero if the indices are not valid
declarations.title: elem

declarations.comments:
computes the transpose of the matrix
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transpose
declarations.title: transpose

declarations.comments:
computes the addition of two matrices
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matrix_addition
declarations.title: add

declarations.comments:
computes the (left) scalar multiplication of a matrice
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalar_multiplication
declarations.title: smult

declarations.comments:
computes the inverse of the matrix
using Gauss-Jordan Elimination and augmented matrix
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Invertible_matrix#Gaussian_elimination
declarations.title: inverse

declarations.comments:
computes the reduced row echelon form of the matrix and compute its determinant if the matrix is square
see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Row_echelon_form
declarations.title: gaussJordan

declarations.comments:
computes the trace of the matrix
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trace_(linear_algebra)
declarations.title: trace

declarations.comments:
computes the determinant of a square matrix
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Determinant
declarations.title: determinant

declarations.comments:
computes a basis the image (or column space) of the matrix
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Row_and_column_spaces
declarations.title: image

declarations.comments:
computes a basis for the kernel (or null space) of the matrix
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kernel_(linear_algebra)
declarations.title: kernel

declarations.comments: computes the rank of the matrix
declarations.title: rank

declarations.comments: solve the equation M x = b for a given matrix M and vector b
declarations.title: solveLinearSystem

declarations.comments: tests if the vector is null i.e. contains only zero values
declarations.title: null

declarations.comments:
returns the element at index i
returns zero if the index are not valid
declarations.title: elem

declarations.comments:
dot product between two vectors.
returns zero if the two vectors have not the same size
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dot_product
declarations.title: dot

declarations.comments:
returns true if v1 and v2 are colinear i.e. there exists a scalar n such that v1 = n v2
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Collinearity
declarations.title: colinear
